MathMLElementMaction.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The <maction> MathML element allows to bind actions to mathematical expressions. By default, only the first child is rendered but some browsers may take into account actiontype and selection attributes to implement custom behaviors.

blockquote.para: Note: Historically, this element provided a mechanism to make MathML formulas interactive. Nowadays, it is recommended to rely on JavaScript and other Web technologies to implement this use case.
